content: **knitted mittens in drops nepal the piece is worked with nordic pattern ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design pattern x-496 yarn group c or a + a ------------------------------------------------------- **sizes** s - m/l circumference approx 20-22 cm length approx 22-24 cm **yarn** colour alternative 1 drops nepal from garnstudio belongs to yarn group c 100-100 g colour 7139 grey green 50-50 g colour 8915 chalk colour alternative 2 drops nepal from garnstudio belongs to yarn group c 100-100 g colour 8917 walnut 50-50 g colour 0100 off white **needles** drops double pointed needles size 3 5 mm drops double pointed needles size 3 mm the technique magic loop can be used you then only need 80 cm circular needle in each size **knitting gauge** 20 stitches in width and 27 row in height with stocking stitch = 10 x 10 cm note needle size is only a guide if you get too many stitches on 10 cm change to a larger needle size if you get too few stitches on 10 cm change to a smaller needle size
